text: Orena ce māso seso gimhāna nti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyeseyya orena ddhamāso seso gimhāna nti katvā nivāseyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Orena ce māso seso gimhāna nti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyeseyya orena ddhamāso seso gimhāna nti katvā nivāseyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: If when more than a month is left to the hot season he should seek a rains-bathing cloth, (or) when more than a half-month is left to the hot season, (the cloth) having been made should be worn, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
ถ้าเธอ (รู้) ว่าฤดูร้อนเหลือล้ำกว่า ๑ เดือนแสวงหาจีวร คือผ้าอาบน้ำฝน (รู้) ว่าฤดูร้อนเหลือล้ำกว่ากึ่งเดือนทำนุ่ง เป็นนิสสัคคิยปาจิตตีย์

If he should, seek rains-robe: or material) (reckoning that) the Rest of the Hot Season (starts) earlier than the (last month) (of tnat season) and should wear it (reckoning that) the Rest of the Hoi Season (starts) earlier than the (last) fortnight (of that season), this entails expiation with forfeiture.
